description: In this two week training session, you will learn about fancy and powerful kicks like 360,540,720,Spining Back Kick,Spining Hook Kick,etc,With Shifu IP.
Boxing Booster trainging will increse your speed,agility,accuracy and form in Wing-Chun Boxing.Shifu IP will help you to get the best out of this course with is techniques.
Endurance is most important thing for a fighter.In This Traing Shifu IP will teach you about endurance boosting traning.This training is for beginners and intermediate learners.

Dummy traing enhances your punching and bocking ability to another level.Practicing puches and blocks on wodden dummy you techniques gets more solid.For,that first of all you 've to know the right way to train with wooden dummy.
If you take any martial art,at initial phase you need to master the basics of that art.On this session Master Ip will teach you the fundamental of Wing-Chun.
Playing with bo staff is a fancy art or skill.Any one will appreciate your skill of bo staff and you will be able to take down bad guys with spining moves.
